entry.dcterms:description: family in childhood, secondary school, work, workplace, image of society, the structure of income and expenditures, relationship with fellow-pupils (sociometry)

survey data
cross-section

Representative sample of those who finished secondary school in Csongrád county between 1969-1981; the sample was drawn by types of school and from classes within schools: 252 persons from secondary schools specialized in economics or health care, 180 persons from technical high schools, 241 persons from grammar schools.
data collection with questionnaire
A
